title: People Chips
body: <p>I think the key to <a href="http://www.wired.com/news/technology/0,1282,65332,00.html?tw=wn_tophead_4" title="FDA Says Docs Can Chip Patients">this Wired article</a> is the last paragraph:</p><blockquote>"[...] Meanwhile, the chip has been used for a number of security-related tasks as well as for pure whimsy: Club hoppers in Barcelona, Spain, now use the microchip much like a smartcard to speed drink orders and payment."</blockquote><p>I can't wait to get my own personal <a href="http://www.e-zpassny.com/" title="yay EZPass!">EZ-Pass</a>/<a href="http://www.exxon.com/USA-English/GFM/How_to_Buy/Speedpass_Payment_System.asp" title="yay Speedpass!">Speedpass</a> permanently embedded into my hand!</p>
